name: VR Crazy Traffic Bike Racer
description:
Thrilling dirt bike racing in traffic rush to become a highway rider by dodging and showing stunts against highway traffic in most wanted bike stunt racing in VR Crazy Traffic Bike Racer. Enjoy modern crazy bike riding in virtual reality world with ultra-fast high speed to dodge and beat the traffic. Experience VR based simulated bike survival asphalt racing with furious action racing in virtual reality game.
Control bike in traffic by avoiding and dodging city traffic as an insane driver to overtake highway traffic in endless bike survival madness using digital virtual reality headset. Dare to drive highway bike racing adventure to become top bike racer in traffic with realistic physics simulations and crazy bike racing to dodge traffic in VR Crazy Traffic Bike Racer. Intense traffic challenges with fastest motorbike in the world to dodge traffic and perform highly risky stunts on a wheelie at a speed of over 280m/h hit the road with the roar of your superbike sound in virtual reality show.
Enjoy most wanted reckless virtual reality gamee in extreme highway traffic racing environment to become real rider using your riding skills along with nitro booster on a high speed track. This is most challenging VR 360 gameplay bike stunt riding game with realistic bike racing simulations and crazy rider to steer endless pro racing. Drive like highway traffic bike racer to beat the traffic in free style thriller highway rider bike riding racing death game in VR Crazy Traffic Bike Racer.
Enjoy motorcycle survival with incredible fast speed during rush traffic hour. Enjoy five amazingly simulated super bikes racing, three riders and three detailed tracks with realistic visuals and real time physics. Be careful because crashing into cars will end the game with realistic crash effects.
Drive and dodge the traffic in a very nasty way to become the best pro racer in highway rider games, a new era in Virtual Reality racing games on a traffic bike racer game. Ride in VR Crazy Traffic Bike Racer to become top crazy racer with amazing fuel picks to survive. If you love dirt traffic bike racing with realistic simulations, download this game and enjoy for free.
VR Crazy Traffic Bike Racer is a tremendous achievement in the genre of VR gaming that lets you a play combines with stunning, HD quality graphics that let you explore a virtual world while playing in the comfort of your own home.

Wish you all the good luck that you would surely need for these missions.

Key Features:
• Realistic physics based simulations
• Easy controls with friendly GUI
• Challenging and strategy demanding highway traffic
• Real world crash effects
• Stunning 3D HD quality graphics
• Breathtaking real world visuals
• Thrilling sound effects and music
• VR based 3D detailed highway Environment
• Gyro-meter based 360 degree rotation
• Crisp, Cinema like, HD visuals Different city shooting environment
• Layout fully optimized for smartphones and tablets
How to Play:
• Slide your device into VR glasses
• Watch highly immersive VR world by simply looking around
• Tilt the VR device left/right to change the direction
